about_the_game:
This DLC gives you an additional pack of 6 Camera Filters to use while taking photos in Shashingo!

Manga
Capture your photos as black and white artwork that looks like it came out of your favourite manga!

Retro Game
Capture the nostalgia of a retro game with this green-toned pixel filter!

Mirror
See your images from a different perspective by flipping half of the image with this mirror filter.

Cracked Lens
Make the best of a bad situation with this cracked lens filter.

Glitch
It looks like the photo got corrupted while saving with this filter!

Vaporwave
Bring out a spectacular array of bright colours and retro graphics with this vaporwave filter!

Vaporwave

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel i5-2500 3.3GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 7x series / Radeon HD 6570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible or onboard chipset

Recommended:
